Commands.Cover: Target: 3 turns CoverSelf: 3 turns ATK Up IMastery with 1 useTake single-target attacks in place of covered ally
Commands.Cover+: Allies: 5 turns Cover.Self: 5 turns ATK Up I.Take single-target attacks in place of covered allies
Commands.Blade Block: Self: 2 turns Dodge Up III & DEF Up IMastery with 1 use
Commands.Blade Block+: Self: 5 turns Dodge Up V & DEF Up I.Dodging a physical attack triggers a counterattack

Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Bravery Cover: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Cover.
Artifacts.Bravery Blade Block: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Blade Block.

Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy.
Passives.Master Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense after mastering an ability.
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Danger Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when HP is under 20%.
Passives.Cover Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Cover.
Passives.HP Damage Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense after taking HP damage.
Passives.Blade Block Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Blade Block.
Passives.BRV Live: Prevents Break status if BRV is over 50%.BRV value remains at 1.
Passives.A Grandfather's Lifestyle: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves its value at 1.
